forum.content:
I'm now living in Tainan and would like to meet new friends to chat with in English~~~

I lived and worked in GB & Aus for more than a decade and have moved back to Tainan for a couple of months.

If you would like to meet a new friend to chat with in English, then we really should take this chance to meet each other!!
forum.title: Looking for friends to chat in English!!
